00016     template <unsigned D> struct NumAxes {
00017         enum { num = NumAxes<D-1>::num+D-1 };
00018     };
00020     template <> struct NumAxes<0> { enum { num = 0 }; };
00022     template <> struct NumAxes<1> { enum { num = 0 }; };
00023 
00025 
00039     template <unsigned D> class RotationAxes {
00040         public:
00046             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00047                 throw NotYetImplementedException(
00048                         "RotationAxes<"+Globals::Instance().itoa(D)+">::axis("+
00049                         Globals::Instance().itoa(which)+", "+
00050                         Globals::Instance().itoa(index)+")");
00051             }
00052         private:
00054             static unsigned _axis[2][NumAxes<D>::num];
00055     };
00056 
00058     template <> class RotationAxes<3> {
00059         public:
00065             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00066                 return _axis[which][index];
00067             }
00068         private:
00069             static const unsigned _axis[2][3];  
00070     };
00071 
00073     template <> class RotationAxes<4> {
00074         public:
00080             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00081                 return _axis[which][index];
00082             }
00083         private:
00084             static const unsigned _axis[2][6];  
00085     };

00092     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Rotation {
00093 
00094         public:
00096             Rotation<D, N>(): axis() { }
00097 
00099 
00101             Rotation<D, N> (N r0, ... );
00102 
00104 
00106             N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00108 
00110             N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00111 
00113 
00115             operator Matrix<D, N>() const;
00116 
00119             Rotation<D, N> &operator+= (const Rotation<D, N> &);
00120 
00122             operator bool() const { return axis.sqnorm() != 0.; }
00123 
00125             const Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> &r() const { return axis; }
00126 
00128             Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> &r() { return axis; }
00129 
00130         private:
00132             Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> axis;
00133     };
00134 
00135     template <unsigned D, typename N> Rotation<D, N>::Rotation (N r0, ... ):
00136             axis() {
00137         axis[0] = r0;
00138         va_list argp;
00139         va_start (argp, r0);
00140         for (unsigned i = 1; i < NumAxes<D>::num; i++) {
00141             axis[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00142         }
00143         va_end (argp);
00144     }
00145 
00146     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00147             N &Rotation<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00148         assert(i < NumAxes<D>::num);
00149         return axis[i];
00150     }
00151 
00152     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00153             N Rotation<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00154         assert(i < NumAxes<D>::num);
00155         return axis[i];
00156     }
00157 
00158     template <unsigned D, typename N> Rotation<D, N>::operator Matrix<D, N>() const {
00159         Matrix<D, N> R;
00160         for (unsigned i = 0; i < NumAxes<D>::num; i++) {
00161             if (axis[i]) {
00162                 R *= Matrix<D, N>(RotationAxes<D>::axis(0, i), RotationAxes<D>::axis(1, i), axis[i]);
00163             }
00164         }
00165         return R;
00166     }
00167 
00168     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00169             Rotation<D, N> &Rotation<D, N>::operator +=(const Rotation<D, N>& that) {
00170         axis += that.axis;
00171         return *this;
00172     }

00181             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Rotation<D, N> &v) {
00182         o << v.r();
00183         return o;
